        font-family: "roboto";
      }

          size: A3 landscape;
      }
    
      .score-card {
        box-sizing: border-box;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 25px 25px;
        font-size: 1.1vw;
        color: #202528;
      }
      .section {
          display: grid;
          grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
          grid-column-gap: 10%;
          margin-left: 40px;
      }
      .score-card .project-details-wrapper {
          padding-bottom: 10px;
          border-bottom: 1px solid #111;
    
      }
      .score-card .project-details-wrapper .project-details {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 36em auto 11.03em;
        grid-column-gap: 4%;
        align-items: end;
      }
      .score-card .project-details-wrapper .project-details .project-title {
        margin: 0;
        padding-left: 20px;
        font-size: 1.9em;
        font-weight: initial;
        text-transform: capitalize;
      }
      .score-card .project-details-wrapper .project-details .logo {
          margin: 0;
          width: 100px;
          padding-bottom: 10px;
          transform: translateY(5pt);
      }
      .score-card .project-details-wrapper .project-details .logo img {
          width: 9.03em;
          padding-bottom:25px;
          padding-right:25px;
      }
      .score-card .project-details-wrapper .project-details div > div {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 10em 1fr;
        grid-column-gap: 10px;
        font-size: 0.8em;
        color: #202528;
      }
      .score-card .project-details-wrapper .project-details div > div span {
        text-align: right;
      }
      .score-card .project-description {
        padding-bottom:3px;
      }
      .score-card .project-details-wrapper .project-details div > div span:nth-of-type(2) {
        text-align: left;
        font-weight: 600;
      }
      .score-card .ok {
        color: #00a25f;
      }
      .score-card .seq {
          color: #00a25f;
      }
    
    </style>
    <style>
      .element-tables {
        column-gap: 8%;
        margin-top: 10px;
        margin-left: 40px;
        margin-right: 40px;
        height: calc(95% - 6.76vw - 0px);
      }
      table {
        width: 23%;
        display: block;
        height: 100%;
        min-width: 23%;
        box-sizing: border-box;
      }
      table tbody {
        height: 100%;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        column-gap: 25px;
      }
      table tr {
        width: 100%;
        display: flex;
      }
      thead td {
        font-weight: 600;
      }
      tr.type-header td {
        width: 100% !important;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.9em;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #111;
        padding-bottom: 1px;
        margin-bottom: 4px;
        margin-right: 0;
        margin-top: 8px;
      }
      tr.section-header + tr.type-header td {
        margin-top: 0;
      }
      tr.section-header td {
        width: 100% !important;
        font-size: 1.0em;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-top: 3px;
      }
      tr.category-header td {
        width: 100% !important;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-top: 12px;
      }
      tr.sub-totals td {
          text-align: right;
          font-weight: 600;
          padding-bottom: 8px;
      }
      tr.sub-totals td:first-of-type {
        padding-right: 15px;
      }
    
    
      tr.type-totals td {
        font-weight: 600;
      }
      td {
          font-size: 0.7em;
          color: #202528;
      }
      td.seq {
          color: #00a25f;
      }
      td.emit {
          color: #202528;
      }
      td.neutral {
          color: #202528;
      }
      td:nth-child(2) {
          text-align: right !important;
      }
      tr:not(.no-label):not(.small-label) > td:first-child {
        width: 60%;
      }
      tr:not(.no-label):not(.small-label) > td:last-child {
          width: 40%;
      }
    
      tr.small-label > td:first-child {
          width: 30%;
      }
      tr.small-label > td:last-child {
          width: 70%;
      }
      tr.no-label > td:first-child {
          width: 100%;
      }
      .totals {
        font-weight: 600;
        padding-top: 8px;
        font-size: 1.2em;
      }
      .net-total {
        white-space: nowrap;
      }
      .text-capitalize {
        text-transform: capitalize;
      }
      .score-card .section-header {
          text-transform: uppercase;
          font-size: 1.1em !important;
          font-weight: 600;
      }
    
      .score-card .section-header.extra-space {
          margin-top: 16px !important;
      }
      .notes {
          font-style: italic;
          font-size: 0.7em;
          color: #202528;
          position: fixed;
          bottom: 2em;
          right: 3em;
      }

                            </td>

                    <tr class="totals">
                        <td style="border-bottom: none;">Net Impact over 60 Years</td>
                        <td style="border-bottom: none;" class="net-total emit ">
                            164,135,201 kgCO?e
                        </td>
                    </tr>
